text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I am——a knight. 
In other words, the king's sword, and shield.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I cannot allow any harm to befall my king. Let this 
『Holy Sword』 be the one to dispel any and all clouds!

text_block_list.name: Vanguard Leader
text_block_list.text:
Alright, we've arrived. The innermost chambers 
of the castle! The only one remaining……is her.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I offer you my respect. Whilst overcoming our 
defenses, your courage has brought you here. However——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: As long as I stand, you will not lay a hand on our king.

text_block_list.name: Vanguard Leader
text_block_list.text: What!? That sword——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes, this is the 『Holy Sword』 entrusted to me by our king! 
I will protect them, the king and the people we cherish!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Haa, hmmph, haa, yaaaaaa!!

Her brilliant swordplay……I couldn't help but 
stare in awe…… Dodging their attacks as if 
she was dancing, she defeated them one-by-one.

text_block_list.name: Vanguard Leader
text_block_list.text:
Grrr, now that it's come to this—— 
Arise, dark dragon, Gargouille!

text_block_list.name: Vanguard Leader
text_block_list.text:
It's true that your sword is quick. However, no matter how 
quick, you will not be able to pierce this one's granite-skin.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Kuu, to bring even monsters…… True, with this 
thin arm, I may not be able to pierce it. However……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——If I were to use both arms.

text_block_list.name: Vanguard Leader
text_block_list.text: What!? That stance……!?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
What makes me the strongest knight is not my "speed". By 
honing myself, striving forth, and staying ever at the ready——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
It is my "sharpness"! 
Dark dragon, offer yourself up to Villandry.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaa!!
(Oooooooooooooooh!)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
『And that concludes the show. 
Thank you for watching』

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: That was awesome, Durandal!

I was completely captivated by the play that was performed at 
the Fan Appreciation Festival. A tale of medieval knights.

The lead role was played by an Uma Musume named 『Durandal』. 
The name of a holy sword that appears in French mythology.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That Uma Musume called Durandal has excellent 
swordsmanship, but apparently she's also amazing 
at running. Particularly short distances.
choice_data_list: I really want to see it then……

text_block_list.text:
If an Uma Musume could move like that, 
then she must be able to run extremely well too.

Maybe if I could become the trainer of an Uma Musume like 
that……I could come closer to being like that person.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I see, so you came to Tracen Academy too. 
I'm glad you made it.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Guiding an Uma Musume is definitely difficult. But, it's 
still something worth investing your whole life in to.

My senpai trainer. Someone who always earnestly 
works with Uma Musume, he's someone I look up to.

I decided to take a chance and try to speak to Durandal. It was 
possible she wouldn't even give me the time of day, but……
choice_data_list: Your acting from before was great!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
You are……a new trainer, right? 
Sounds like you were able to see the play.
choice_data_list: I was really moved! It was great!
I was really moved! It was great!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……I see. 
I'm glad you were able to enjoy it.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for telling me. 
……Well then.

At first glance, she seemed like she would be difficult 
to talk to, like a noble. However, that wasn't the case.

——And then several days later. 
Now it was time to see her running in person.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Today is just a mock race right? Although I call myself 
a knight……I am still a vagabond without a King……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Can someone act as a temporary trainer and issue me commands?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Huh? A trainer……? 
For a mock race are you planning to have a temporary trainer?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Normally, you don't have a trainer until 
after a Selection Race. However, from this point 
onwards, I will be asking for this each time.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I want to determine it with my own eyes. 
To find a King I can serve.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, Durandal's at it again. 
She's already doing the usual thing.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh, how do you do? 
I'm Fine Motion. One of Durandal's classmates.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Durandal always asks me about kings and such. 
Since I'm royalty♪

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
She's searching really hard you know. As a knight, 
searching for a King she can devote herself to.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. For a knight, a king is someone who not only 
changes their future, but even their concept of justice. 
So she probably wants to examine them thoroughly.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
She's a really serious and stubborn girl, so unless she 
acknowledges them from the bottom of her heart, I don't 
think she'll be willing to offer her sword to them.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'll accept that offer!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
No, I will! Being able to instruct someone like 
Durandal is a chance that doesn't come by often.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Everyone, thank you very much.

Since that was the case, several people stepped 
forward. This was a rare opportunity. So——
As soon as I said that——
Then I'll accept as well.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——!! You are……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
It's an honor. To think a trainer as renowned 
as you would volunteer. Then for today, please.

That was someone I knew well. 
The senpai trainer I looked up to.
